docs.snippet: The shows went on as scheduled yesterday on Seventh Avenue, despite raging winds and freezing cold. The models all showed up, and so did the audience. The thing is, the theme was summer, and someone at each presentation felt obligated to thank the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The shows went on as scheduled yesterday on Seventh Avenue, despite raging winds and freezing cold. The models all showed up, and so did the audience. The thing is, the theme was summer, and someone at each presentation felt obligated to thank the audience for turn ing up and to remind the guests that, yes, indeed, summer was around the corner.
docs.abstract: Spring collections of Calvin Klein and Oscar de la Renta described; illus (L)

headline.main: Fashion: Wintry Winds Raged, But It Was Summer on 7th Ave.

headline.main: Still Friends at Work, Even After the Bitterness of Divorce
